resources.string: All files will be automatically synced at a scheduled interval. Use the Sync Button below to force a sync.
The name of the configuration that will be placed in the rclone.conf file
The name of the Azure Blob Storage container where the files will be uploaded to
SAS URL for connecting to the Azure Blob Storage
The type of storage that the files will be uploaded to
A colon separated list of relative directories to upload (e.g. Download/NetworkSurveyData:Download/NinjaGPS )
The device ID, which will be used to create a folder to group all uploaded files together
If true, then the SyncMonkey app will run in the background on phone boot
If true, then files will only be uploaded when a VPN is active
